timeline.message:
Add publisher specific configuration to Brightroll bidder config

Update tests.

Q.

`/bid/bid/rubiconpbs` is it ok ?
We are replace badv, badc by `accounts[n].id`
`badv` is not used anywhere in the code.

timeline.bodyText: Since BidderAccount is intended for use exclusively within Spring configuration and wiring code it shouldn't be here. Please create another holder class in org.prebid.server.bidder.brightroll.model package that will be used by the bidder implementation.
timeline.author: schernysh

replies.bodyText: Thanks, good point to separate logic
replies.author: DGarbar

timeline.bodyText: While it is not directly related to this PR, let's fix this dependency as well.
timeline.author: schernysh

timeline.bodyText: Please see how this is handled for FacebookBidder (FacebookConfigurationProperties). There is no need to add this field to generic class for properties.
timeline.author: schernysh

timeline.bodyText: This class should be an inner class of BrightrollConfiguration.
timeline.author: schernysh
